attributes.action: make  29th march a public holiday, the death of democracy in the united kingdom
attributes.background: this should not be a bank holiday , banks tried to kill the country.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by a public holiday that isn't a bank holiday. In any case, we already have a petition open that calls for 29th March to be a public holiday. We can't accept another petition calling for the same thing, even though it is for a different reason.
